creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
portfolio: Women in Four Settings (Fujo yondai 婦女四題)
text: Autumn shows a more assertively modern woman, or moga (abbreviated from modan gaaru, modern girl). Rather than the traditional shimada style of coiffure, she sports the modish rajio-maki (radio roll), recalling the headphones used by radio announcers. Her green jacket (haori), glimpsed beneath her maroon shawl, is patterned with Western playing card suits.
title: Autumn
